Transformation Rule: CASE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM tanggal) WHEN 1 THEN 'Januari' ...
CASE WHEN bulan BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN 1 ...
CASE WHEN bulan <= 6 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END
CASE WHEN hari_dalam_minggu IN (0, 6) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END
Lookup dim.pegawai.pegawai_key WHERE nip = pembuat_surat_nip AND is_current = TRUE
CASE WHEN tanggal_disposisi IS NOT NULL THEN tanggal_disposisi - tanggal_surat ELSE NULL END

Business Rule: Grain: One row per service request

Transformation Rule: Lookup dim.pegawai.pegawai_key WHERE nip = pemohon_nip AND is_current = TRUE
Lookup dim.pegawai.pegawai_key WHERE nip = petugas_nip AND is_current = TRUE
CASE WHEN rating_kepuasan BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN rating_kepuasan ELSE NULL END
CASE WHEN tanggal_selesai IS NOT NULL THEN tanggal_selesai - tanggal_permintaan ELSE NULL END
CASE WHEN lama_proses_hari <= target_sla_hari THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END

Business Rule: Grain: One row per asset per snapshot

Transformation Rule: Lookup dim.pegawai.pegawai_key WHERE nip = penanggung_jawab_nip AND is_current = TRUE

Data Quality Check: IN (BAIK, RUSAK RINGAN, RUSAK BERAT, etc)

Transformation Rule: EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(snapshot_date, tanggal_perolehan)) * 12 + EXTRACT(MONTH FROM AGE(snapshot_date, tanggal_perolehan))
